email_1_initial_outreach.subject: Idea for fast content localization at Coursera
email_1_initial_outreach.body:
Hi Wilson Tan,

Hi Wilson Tan,

I noticed Coursera is a leader in the E-Learning space, which requires constantly updated, localized video content. Dublabs.ai specifically helps companies like yours **generate multi-language audio and video for their e-learning courses 10x faster than traditional dubbing.**.

Dublabs.ai is an AI-powered dubbing solution that helps companies like yours **generate multi-language audio and video for their e-learning courses 10x faster than traditional dubbing.** by automatically syncing translated audio to your original video.

Would you be open to a quick 15-minute demo to see the results (we can use one of your videos)?

Best,
[Your Name]
email_1_initial_outreach.call_to_action: Are you open to a quick 15-minute conversation on Thursday or Friday?

email_2_follow_up.subject: Re: Idea for fast content localization at Coursera
email_2_follow_up.body:
Hi Wilson Tan,

Bumping this up. The challenge of scaling content for Coursera's partnership is real. 

Dublabs.ai could solve your multi-language video problem in the next week. If that's not a priority right now, just let me know, and I'll close the loop.

Best,
[Your Name]

email_3_value_add.subject: A case study on multi-language course launches for EdTech
email_3_value_add.body:
Hi Wilson Tan,

If you're currently in the planning phase for Coursera's international strategy, you might find this helpful:

We put together a short case study on how a large EdTech firm reduced their time-to-market for a new course from 9 weeks to 1 week using AI dubbing. [Insert link to relevant case study here].

Let me know if this sparks any ideas.

Best,
[Your Name]

email_4_breakup.subject: Closing the loop with Coursera on localization
email_4_breakup.body:
Hi Wilson Tan,

This will be my final message. I genuinely believe that as your e-learning platform continues to grow, traditional dubbing costs will slow your ability to enter new markets.

When that need becomes critical, remember Dublabs.ai—we're here to solve the multi-language video bottleneck instantly. Wishing you success,

[Your Name]
